sourcesContent:
export const cyclists = [
	{
		id: 1,
		name: 'Pedro Delgado',
		description: 'Winner of the 1988 Tour de France',
		img: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/57/P%C3%A9dro_DELGADO.jpg',
		alt: 'Pedro Delgado',
	},
	{
		id: 2,
		name: 'Miguel Indurain',
		description: '5 Time Winner of the Tour de France',
		img: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/6d/Miguel_Indurain_%28Tour_de_France_1993%29_%28cropped%29.jpg',
		alt: 'Miguel Indurain',
	},
	{
		id: 3,
		name: 'Greg Lemond',
		description: 'Only American winner of the Tour de France',
		img: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/c2/Greg_Lemond_Alpe_D%27Huez.jpg',
		alt: 'Greg Lemond',
	},
	{
		id: 4,
		name: 'Charly Mottet',
		description: 'Three time winner of the Grand Prix Des Nations',
		img: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/36/Charly_Mottet_-_Dauphin%C3%A9_1988.jpg',
		alt: 'Charly Mottet',
	},
	{
		id: 5,
		name: 'Marino Lejarretta',
		description: 'A top Spanish cyclist of the 80\'s - sometimes rode three tours in one season.',
		img: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/30/Marino_Lejarreta.jpg',
		alt: 'Marino Lejarretta',
	},
	{
		id: 6,
		name: 'Andy Hampsten',
		description: 'Only US rider to win the Giro de Italia',
		img: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/9b/Andy_HAMPSTEN_%28cropped%29.jpg',
		alt: 'Andy Hampsten',
	},
	{
		id: 7,
		name: 'Stephen Roche',
		description: 'Won the Giro de Italia, the Tour de France, and the World Championship in 1987',
		img: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/27/1987_Stephen_Roche_Giro_TT.jpg',
		alt: 'Stephen Roche',
	},
	{
		id: 8,
		name: 'Sean Kelly',
		description: 'King of the classics.',
		img: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/c6/Sean_Kelly%2C_PDM.jpg',
		alt: 'Sean Kelly',
	}
]
